abstract: General Motors says it will sell its Chinese-made Buick Envision in United States in 2016; compact sport-utility vehicle would be first Chinese-made vehicle sold in US.
lead_paragraph: Introduced last year in China, the Buick Envision would be imported to the United States next year, as G.M. tries to maximize its global production.

headline.main: G.M. Will Import Buicks Made in China to the U.S.
headline.print_headline: G.M. Will Import Buicks Made in China to the U.S.

snippet: Introduced last year in China, the Buick Envision would be imported to the United States next year, as G.M. tries to maximize its global production.
